title: Bad Credit Ok, Sparkling swimming pool, Fully furnished apartments
posting_body: ['Twain Apartments in Las Vegas', 'Low Weekly & Monthly Rates', 'FREE Utilities', 'Free Premium Cable TV', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'Additional Information:', '<URL>', 'Apartment Home Features', '-Siegel Rewards Program', '-Bad Credit Ok', '-Walk to Las Vegas Strip', '-Fully furnished apartments', '-Free utilities included with apartment', '-Close to UNLV', '-Rent by the week or month', '-On Las Vegas RTC bus line', '-Large one bedroom apartments', '-Sparkling swimming pool', '-No long term lease required', '-Full kitchen in apartment', 'Free Siegel Reward Program', 'Earn points every time you pay your rent or refer a friend.', 'Use your points to treat yourself to', 'free rent, food, movies, gift cards', ', and much more!', 'Pet Policy', '20lb weight limit and aggressive breeds such as Pit Bulls and Rottweilers are prohibited.', 'Managed by The Siegel Group', 'Equal Housing Opportunity', 'Pricing may include current special and is subject to change without notice.']
